title: Does the Nikon D780 camera have a CMOS sensor? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes Nikon D780 has CMOS sensor. The D780 is Nikon's first digital SLR employing the hybrid AF system for live view mode used by Nikon Z series cameras. ... The camera features an effective pixel count of 24.5 million pixels, and utilizes a backside illumination CMOS sensor that is itself equipped with focal-plane phase-detection AF pixels. Hope this is helpful. Regards Jey
Yes, the D780 uses a BSI CMOS sensor.
